tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE malware_incidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date TIMESTAMP,
  incident_description TEXT,
  response TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE incident_responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    response_datetime TIMESTAMP,
    response_description TEXT,
    response_user_agent TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES malware_incidents(incident_id)
);

CREATE TABLE malware_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_description TEXT,
    malware_name VARCHAR(255),
    malware_type VARCHAR(50),
    response_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE response_teams (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(255),
    team_lead VARCHAR(100),
    team_size INT,
    response_time DATETIME,
    response_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE incident_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    log_date DATETIME,
    log_details TEXT,
    log_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE MalwareIncidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_description TEXT,
    malware_name TEXT,
    malware_type TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE IncidentResponses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    response_date DATE,
    response_details TEXT,
    response_type TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES MalwareIncidents(incident_id)
)

CREATE TABLE MalwarePayments (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    payment_date DATE,
    payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payment_status TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES MalwareIncidents(incident_id)
)

CREATE TABLE IncidentInvestigators (
    investigator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investigator_name TEXT,
    investigator_email TEXT,
    incident_id_assigned INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id_assigned) REFERENCES MalwareIncidents(incident_id)
)

CREATE TABLE malware_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date TIMESTAMP,
    malware_name VARCHAR(255),
    affected_systems INT,
    response TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE incident_responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    response_date TIMESTAMP,
    action_taken TEXT,
    response_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE investigators (
    investigator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investigator_name VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE malware_types (
    malware_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    malware_name VARCHAR(255),
    impact_level INT,
    detection_method TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE affected_systems (
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name VARCHAR(255),
    system_type VARCHAR(255),
    last_scan_date TIMESTAMP
)
